92.eng-name: Afflictions and the End of the World

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "The Hour will not be established till the buttocks of the women of the tribe of Daus move while going round Dhi-al-Khalasa." Dhi-al-Khalasa was the idol of the Daus tribe which they used to worship in the Pre Islamic Period of ignorance

chapter.ara-name: باب تَغْيِيرِ الزَّمَانِ حَتَّى يَعْبُدُوا الأَوْثَانَ
chapter.eng-name: Time will change until idols will be worshipped
